cookies.message: Our website uses cookies to improve your browsing experience and to personalize the content and advertisements we show you. By using our website, you consent to our use of cookies. You can manage your cookie preferences at any time through your browser settings.

home.title: Welcome to the React Boilerplate
home.content: Our React boilerplate, built with Vite and TypeScript, is the perfect starting point for your next project. With e2e and unit testing already set up, you can get started building robust and error-free applications right away. Highly customizable and easy to use, our boilerplate is the ideal choice for developers of all skill levels.

inputs.title: Inputs
inputs.content: These components allow users to interact with the website or application by providing input data or making selections. Examples include forms, text boxes, buttons, drop-down menus, checkboxes, radio buttons, and sliders. The presence of input components indicates that the page is designed to be interactive and responsive to user input.
